/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. Modern skyscrapers tower over the scene, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. In contrast, traditional brick buildings add a touch of history and charm to the landscape. The sun shines brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
